ValidationRule.description: Validate: If Assigned to is different from logged in user then Assigned field will copy from Task to case and If Queue/ Team is filled the Queue/Team will copy from Task to case
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( isNew(), NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT( Process__c ) ) ), ISPICKVAL( Process__c , "Case Assignment"), NOT( ISBLANK( TEXT( Task_Team_Name__c ) ) ), NOT( IF(OwnerId = $User.Id, true, false )) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Queue/ Team name should be blank if Assigned To field is not equal logged in user
